comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Not a nickname: Lute Joseph Boone (May 6, 1890 to July 29, 1982), was a Major League Baseball infielder who played from 1913 to 1916 with the New York Yankees and in 1918 with the Pittsburgh Pirates.

comment.author: 34735893@N00
comment._content: He was my Great-grandfather. His daughter is my father's mother.
